p: Two secY alleles from L. interrogans were recovered from both rodents and humans ( Figure 2, Text S1). The secY C allele was recovered from the wild mouse, M. cookie, from Loei, northern Thailand. This allele had previously been characterized from the ST34 clone, which corresponds to a Autumnalis serogroup human isolate associated with the northern Thailand outbreak between 1999 and 2003 (Thaipadungpanit et al. 2007). Secondly, the secY D allele (MLVA pattern 640/750/650) of the Pyrogenes serogroup was found in both rodent and human samples from Loei, northern Thailand.
